LotisLeft.Description: whether the risky choice is displayed on the left, 1 = left, 0 = right

Lot_mon.Description: size of reward if win the lottery

Sure_mon.Description: size of reward if choose the sure option

dist.Description: shape of distribution, should match the color (narrow green, wide red, skew blue)

response.Description: f or j; which button (side) the participant pushed

RT.Description: reaction time (ms); blank values mean no response
